newsitem.title: USA: Aaron Rents stake cut by Gabelli group.
newsitem.headline: Aaron Rents stake cut by Gabelli group.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Wednesday it cut its stake in Aaron Rents Inc to 429,000 Class A common shares or 11.32 percent from 12.36 percent held previously.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 29,500 Class A common shares sold between January 10 and January 27 at prices ranging from $9.875 to $13 per share.
Aaron Rents, of Atlanta, Ga., manufactures, rents and sells residential and office furniture and other merchandise.
